summary:
This mod will add a nord female companion which has a ability to transform
herself into a dangerous draugr when you are in combat.She leveled with the
player.she will be in draugr form as long as the player is in combat.After
that she will back int her human form.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
descriptionHtml:
This mod will add a nord female companion which has a ability to transform
herself into a dangerous draugr when you are in combat.She leveled with the
player.she will be in draugr form as long as the player is in combat.After
that she will back int her human form.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I have removed her from vanilla follower faction so you can make follow her
even if you have other follower following you

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
she will not conflict with any other follower mod as she is not in vanilla follower
quest.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Along with basic functions some new functions are added Such as you can ask her for cure disease potion when contacted with disease and many such functions is added and in future more will get added.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
you can find her in Sleeping Giant Inn in riverwood village waiting for you for new adventure.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
She is  currently partially voiced so you may have to keep subtitle on.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
she can wear anything you put in her inventory.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Small Quest is added about her background which is also partially
voiced.
In future some additional quest will be added along with full voice
acting.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This is just a Beta version and purely for testing purpose so expect some
bugs.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Sorry for such unfriendly description but i will make it clear as i update the mods.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Thanks
author: Praveen
